name: Stres
overview: A puzzle game that is a clone of Atomix. Game design by Tunç Dindaş and Cem Tanik. Coding by Cem Tanik. Graphics by Tunç Dindaş; level design by Dursun Turunç. The game came with 50 levels, though buggy operation often left the user with far less playable levels. It was developed by Zombie Boys and published by Sultan Soft, which was released in Europe in 1994. On each level, you are given a couple of atoms, and your task is to arrange them into a specific molecule or shape within a given, limited time frame.
